snippet: The Kenyan police disrupted a major terrorist attack on Friday in its final stages of planning, arresting two people with explosive devices and seizing a cache of weapons and ammunition, officials said.
abstract: Kenyan police halt a major terrorist plot, arresting two people with explosive devices and seizing a cache of weapons and ammunition; police search for eight more suspects, all with ties to the Shabab, militant group in neighboring Somalia that is linked to Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan police disrupted a major terrorist attack on Friday in its final stages of planning, arresting two people with explosive devices and seizing a cache of weapons and ammunition, officials said.
